amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that any increase in funding provided shall operate notwithstanding any limitation placed on the availability of the Crime Victims Fund.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Jones (OH) to the McCollum amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones (OH) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 32 (Roll no. 478).
